titles.title: To encourage States to require the installation of residential carbon monoxide detectors in homes, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on House Administration, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
